@runnewaug04 Scenario: Validation of Line Details button by clicking Edit Cart(Top) button in Cart Page through Scan flow # PageWiseFeatures/Shopping_cart.feature:75 Given I am in Shopping cart Page through Scan flow # DeviceSearch.shopCart_scan() When I click Edit cart at top of the cart summary # ShoppingCart.editCartTop() Then I see Edit order Page # ShoppingCart.editOrderPage() When I click Line Details button # ShoppingCart.line_button() Then I see the line details in Device Customize Page # ShoppingCart.lineDetails()
